meanings.sent1: The mechanic will dieselize the old truck for better mileage.
meanings.sent2: They decided to dieselize their fleet of vehicles for increased efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The farmer tried to dieselize his tractor, but accidentally used cooking oil instead.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to dieselize her lifestyle led to significant savings on fuel costs.
meanings.sent5: The decision to dieselize the factory's machinery was a game-changer for productivity.

meanings.definition: To equip with a diesel engine.
meanings.sent1: The company plans to dieselize their entire truck fleet by next year.
meanings.sent2: They will dieselize the boat to make it more powerful on the water.
meanings.sent3: The idea to dieselize the lawnmower with a diesel engine seemed unconventional but worked well.
meanings.sent4: His determination to dieselize the old car breathed new life into it.
meanings.sent5: The decision to dieselize the generator ensured uninterrupted power supply during the storm.
